title: Bruce Springsteen - The Promise The Darkness On The Edge Of Town
description:
The Promise: The Darkness on the Edge of Town Story is a 2010 released Deluxe Box set. It contains a remastered version of the Darkness on the Edge of Town album plus a new two-CD album, The Promise containing 21 previously unreleased outtakes from the Darkness sessions.



Bruce Springsteen - The Promise: The Darkness On The Edge Of Town Story
